member.name: T:RandomizerMod.IC.DupeUIDef
member.summary: Class for converting an arbitrary UIDef on a redundant item to a MsgUIDef which displays the amount of geo replacing the item.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.IC.GSComparison`1
member.summary: Compare a settings field to a given value.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.IC.GSComparison`1.FieldPath
member.summary: Dot separators: e.g. SkipSettings.MildSkips

member.name: E:RandomizerMod.IC.RandomizerModule.OnLoadComplete
member.summary: Event which is invoked during ItemChanger.Events.OnEnterGame, to allow access to the item and placement lookups after all items and placements have loaded.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.IC.RandomizerModule.Items
member.summary: Item lookup indexed parallel to the RandoContext item placement list. Refreshed on entering the game.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.IC.RandomizerModule.Placements
member.summary: Placement lookup indexed parallel to the RandoContext item placement list. Refreshed on entering the game.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.IC.RandoPlacementTag.ids
member.summary: The ids of the item placements managed by this placement.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.IC.TrackerUpdate.SendTransitionFound(ItemChanger.Transition)
member.summary: Static method intended to allow updating visited source transitions by external callers.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Logging.LogManager.loggers
member.summary: Loggers which are activated when the save is created.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Menu.RandomizerMenu.UpdateStartLocationSwitch(RandomizerMod.Settings.StartLocationSettings.RandomizeStartLocationType,System.String)
member.summary:
Applies the parameter settings to the start location page, and refreshes all button states.
Exercise caution, as this triggers several button events and can easily lead to infinite recursion.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Menu.RandomizerMenu.UpdateStartLocationSwitch
member.summary:
Applies the current start location settings to the start location page, and refreshes all button states.
Exercise caution, as this triggers several button events and can easily lead to infinite recursion.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Menu.RandomizerMenu.RebuildPostGenerationRedirectPanel
member.summary:
Polls each subscriber to RandoStartOverride to build the PostGenerationRedirectPage. Returns true if any subscriber returns true.
If this returns true, the Proceed button will be used after rando generation. Otherwise, the Start Game button will be used.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.PriorityEvent`1.IPriorityEventOwner.GetSubscribers
member.summary: Returns an ordered enumerable of the event's subscribers at the moment of the request.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.PriorityEvent`1.IPriorityEventOwner.GetSubscriberRange(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns an ordered enumerable of the event's subscribers in the specified priority range, with inclusive bounds.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.LocationDef.FlexibleCount
member.summary: If true, copies of this location after the first may be shuffled among other flexible count locations by the RequestBuilder.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.LocationDef.AdditionalProgressionPenalty
member.summary: If true, copies of this location after the first will receive severe penalties to prevent multiple progression items.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.PoolDef
member.summary: Data structure representing a collection of items and locations that can be optionally randomized.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.PoolDef.Name
member.summary: The name of the pool.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.PoolDef.Group
member.summary: A slightly broader classification which merges smaller pools into larger ones (e.g. Focus into Skill, etc). Used by SplitGroupSettings.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.Name
member.summary: The name of the start. Names should be unique.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.SceneName
member.summary: The scene of the start location in-game.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.X
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the start location in-game.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.Y
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the start location in-game.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.Zone
member.summary: The map zone of the start location in-game.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.Transition
member.summary: The transition which is used as the initial logical progression for this start location.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.Logic
member.summary: Logic evaluated by the SettingsPM to determine whether the start can be selected in the menu. Must not be null.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.RandoLogic
member.summary: Logic evaluated by the SettingsPM to determine whether the start can be randomly selected. If null, Logic is used instead.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.StartDef.ExcludeFromMenu
member.summary: Flag which determines whether the start is given a button in the Start Locations menu. Hidden starts can still be randomly selected.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.TransitionSides.OneWayIn
member.summary: A one way transition exiting a scene.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.TransitionSides.OneWayOut
member.summary: A one way transition entering a scene.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RandomizerMod.IsRandoSave
member.summary: Returns true if the currently loaded settings contain valid RandomizerMod data.

member.name: P:RandomizerMod.RC.ItemPlacement.Index
member.summary: The index of the item placement in the RandoModContext item placements. Initialized to -1 if the placement is not part of the ctx.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.LogicInts.NotchCostInt
member.summary: LogicInt which returns 1 less than the number of notches to equip the charm with or without overcharming.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.LogicInts.SafeNotchCostInt
member.summary: LogicInt which returns 1 less than the number of notches needed to equip the charm without overcharming.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.LogicInts.StartLocationDelta
member.summary: LogicInt which is true exactly when the GenerationSettings StartLocation equals its argument.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.PlaceholderItem
member.summary:
A wrapper for a RandoModItem to allow it to be ignored by logic.
Used mainly with duplicate progression, to avoid skewing.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.PlaceholderItem.Wrap
member.summary: Hides the innerItem of the PlaceholderItem from logic.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.PlaceholderItem.Unwrap
member.summary: Makes the innerItem of the PlaceholderItem visible to logic.

member.name: E:RandomizerMod.RC.ProgressionInitializer.OnCreateProgressionInitializer
member.summary: Event invoked after base randomizer term modifiers are added to the initializer.

member.name: E:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoController.OnExportCompleted
member.summary: Event invoked on the RandoController immediately after sending all data to ItemChanger, but before printing logs and activating tracker data.

member.name: E:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoController.OnCalculateHash
member.summary:
Event which allows external subscribers to modify the hash. Each subscriber is invoked separately, and the results are combined into the hash seed.
Return values of 0 are ignored, and do not modify the hash.
The second argument is the base hash seed, depending only on the generation settings and the placement data.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModItem.info
member.summary:
The ItemRequestInfo associated with the item. May be null if the item does not require modification.
This field is not serialized and will be null upon reloading the game.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModItem.ItemDef
member.summary:
The ItemDef associated with the location. Preferred over Data.GetItemDef, since this preserves modified item data.
This field is serialized, and is safe to use after reloading the game. May rarely be null for external items which choose not to supply a value.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModLocation.info
member.summary:
The LocationRequestInfo associated with the location. May be null if the location does not require modification.
This field is not serialized and will be null upon reloading the game.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModLocation.LocationDef
member.summary:
The LocationDef associated with the location. Preferred over Data.GetLocationDef, since this preserves modified location data.
This field is serialized, and is safe to use after reloading the game. May rarely be null for external locations which choose not to supply a value.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModTransition.info
member.summary:
The TransitionRequestInfo associated with the transition. May be null if the transition does not require modification.
This field is not serialized and will be null upon reloading the game.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoModTransition.TransitionDef
member.summary:
The TransitionDef associated with the location. Preferred over Data.GetTransitionDef, since this preserves modified transition data.
This field is serialized, and is safe to use after reloading the game.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RCData.GetNewLogicManager(RandomizerMod.Settings.GenerationSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new LogicManager, allowing edits from local files and runtime hooks.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RCData.RuntimeLogicOverride
member.summary:
Event invoked when building the LogicManager for randomization.
A subscriber with a nonpositive key is invoked before local logic edits.
A subscriber with a positive key is invoked after local logic edits.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.CDFWeightedArray`1.#ctor(`0[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a new CDFWeightedArray with the given values. Densities should have the same positive length as values, and its entries should be increasing between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.ICFactory.MakeItemWithEvents(System.String,RandomizerCore.RandoPlacement)
member.summary:
Makes the item by name using the info in the RequestBuilder, or else the default method.
This does not consider the events attached to the RandoModItem, if any.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.ICFactory.MakeItem(System.String)
member.summary: Makes the item by name, using ItemChanger.Finder.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.ICFactory.TryFetchPlacement(System.String,ItemChanger.AbstractPlacement@)
member.summary: Looks up the placement by name. If the placement has not yet been added, does nothing and returns false.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.ICFactory.FetchOrMakePlacement(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up the placement by name. If the placmeent has not yet been added, makes and adds the placement using the default procedure.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RandoFactory.MakeWrappedItem(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a PlaceholderItem. The item will be exported identically to the result of MakeItem, but will be treated by logic as an EmptyItem.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts
member.summary: Strings used by the RequestBuilder as labels.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.MainTransitionStage
member.summary: Label for the transition stage, in transition rando only.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.MainItemStage
member.summary: Label for the default stage, in any rando.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.MainItemGroup
member.summary: Label for the default group of the default stage, in any rando.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.GrubMimicStage
member.summary: Label for the stage of grubs and mimics, when mimics are randomized but grubs are not randomized.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.GrubMimicGroup
member.summary: Label for the group of grubs and mimics, when mimics are randomized but grubs are not randomized.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.SplitGroupPrefix
member.summary: Prefix used for split groups. The label is formed by appending an integer between 1 and 99 according to the setting.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.InLeftOutRightGroup
member.summary: Label for the corresponding matched transition group.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.InRightOutLeftGroup
member.summary: Label for the corresponding matched transition group.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.InBotOutTopGroup
member.summary: Label for the corresponding matched transition group.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.InTopOutBotGroup
member.summary: Label for the corresponding matched transition group.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.OneWayGroup
member.summary: Label for the group of one-way transitions in any transition rando.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RBConsts.TwoWayGroup
member.summary: Label for the group of two-way transitions, in non-matched transition rando.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder
member.summary: Class used to build the request that is passed to the randomizer. The OnUpdate event allows modification of the request as it is built.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.EnumerateItemGroups
member.summary: Enumerates the GroupBuilders of type ItemGroupBuilder.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.EnumerateTransitionGroups
member.summary: Enumerates the GroupBuilers not of type ItemGroupBuilder.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.Vanilla
member.summary: List of vanilla requests, with indexing for fast lookup by location/source transition name.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.AddStage(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a stage with the given label after all existing stages.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.InsertStage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary:
Creates a StageBuilder at the specified index with the given label.
Throws an exception if the index is out of range or the label is already in use.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.MoveStage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary:
Moves the stage with the given label to the given index.
Throws an exception if the index is out of range or the stage with the given label is not found.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.TryGetStage(System.String,RandomizerMod.RC.StageBuilder@)
member.summary: Searches for a StageBuilder with the given label and returns it if found.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.GetGroupFor(System.String,RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.ElementType)
member.summary: Searches for the appropriate group for the named item, location, or transition, using the OnGetGroupFor event.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.GetItemGroupFor(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for the appropriate item group for the named item, using the OnGetGroupFor event.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.GetLocationGroupFor(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for the appropriate item group for the named location, using the OnGetGroupFor event.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.AddItemByName(System.String)
member.summary: Adds one copy of the named item to the group returned by GetItemGroupFor.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.AddItemByName(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the requested number of copies of the named item to the group returned by GetItemGroupFor.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveItemByName(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all copies of the named item from all item groups.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.AddLocationByName(System.String)
member.summary: Adds one copy of the named location to the group returned by GetLocationGroupFor.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.AddLocationByName(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the requested number of copies of the named location to the group returned by GetLocationGroupFor.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveLocationByName(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all copies of the named location from all item groups.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveLocationByName(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the requested number of copies of the named location from the group returned by GetLocationGroupFor.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveItemsWhere(System.Predicate{System.String})
member.summary: Removes all copies of all items in any item groups for which the predicate returns true.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.ReplaceItem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces each copy of the named item in each item group with the replacement string.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveLocationsWhere(System.Predicate{System.String})
member.summary: Removes all copies of all locations in any item groups for which the predicate returns true.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveTransitionByName(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the transition by name from all transition groups.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveTransitionsWhere(System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Removes all copies of all transitions in any transition groups where the selector returns true.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.UnrandomizeTransitionByName(System.String)
member.summary: Identical to RemoveTransitionByName, but if the transition is a source, it is ensured to be in Vanilla with its VanillaTarget.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.UnrandomizeTransitionsWhere(System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Identical to RemoveTransitionsWhere, but each removed source transition is ensured to be in Vanilla with its VanillaTarget.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.EnsureVanillaSourceTransition(System.String)
member.summary:
Ensures that the Vanilla bucket contains the placement of the transition's VanillaTarget at the transition.
Has no effect on a transition without a VanillaTarget, such as a OneWayOut transition.
Only ensures one side of a coupled transition is vanilla.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveFromVanilla(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all vanilla placements for the specified location or source transition.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveFromVanilla(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes all vanilla placements for the specified location or source transition, matching the specified item or target transition.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.RC.RequestBuilder.RemoveFromVanilla(RandomizerMod.RandomizerData.VanillaDef)
member.summary: Removes all vanilla placements matching the defined location, item, and cost list (compared sequentially).

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Settings.SettingsModule.Randomize(System.Random)
member.summary: Randomize the fields of the module.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Settings.SettingsModule.Clamp(RandomizerMod.Settings.GenerationSettings)
member.summary: Fix all compatibility or range issues with current settings.

member.name: T:RandomizerMod.Settings.SettingsPM
member.summary: ProgressionManager for interpreting logic for GenerationSettings

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.obtainedItems
member.summary: The CTX indices of the items that have been obtained.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.previewedLocations
member.summary: A set which tracks the placements which have been previewed, by the Name property of the corresponding RandoLocation.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.visitedTransitions
member.summary: A dictionary which tracks the transitions that have been visited. Keys are sources and values are their targets.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.clearedLocations
member.summary: A set which tracks the placements which have all items obtained, by the Name property of the corresponding RandoLocation.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.uncheckedReachableLocations
member.summary: A set which tracks the placements which are reachable in logic and have items remaining and have not been previewed, by the Name property of the corresponding RandoLocation.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.uncheckedReachableTransitions
member.summary: A set which tracks the transitions which are reachable in logic and have not been visited.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.AllowSequenceBreaks
member.summary: Should out of logic items and transitions be immediately added to current progression when acquired, or deferred until their locations are reachable?

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.outOfLogicObtainedItems
member.summary: The subset of obtainedItems that are currently out of logic, and were obtained by sequence breaking. Entries are removed as they become in logic.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.outOfLogicVisitedTransitions
member.summary: The subset of visited transitions that are currently out of logic, and were visited by sequence breaking.

member.name: F:RandomizerMod.Settings.TrackerData.pm
member.summary: The ProgressionManager for the current state, with the information available to the player.

member.name: M:RandomizerMod.Settings.Util.GetPath(System.String)
member.summary:
Returns the first path to a field with the matching name, for a GenerationSettings object.
e.g. GetPath("MildSkips") => "SkipSettings.MildSkips"
